title: Web Development Bootcamp 2024
description: Comprehensive 2-day bootcamp covering MERN stack, API development, and deployment strategies for beginners to advanced learners
speakers: Dr. Amit Sharma, Prof. Neha Gupta, Industry Expert Raj Mehta
requirements: Laptop with Node.js installed, basic programming knowledge

title: Virtual AI & Machine Learning Summit
description: Live online summit on artificial intelligence and machine learning with interactive Q&A sessions
speakers: Dr. Priya Singh, Mr. Sameer Khan (Data Scientist), AI Researcher Dr. Kumar

title: Corporate Cricket Championship
address: Nehru Stadium, Lodhi Road, New Delhi
description: Annual corporate cricket tournament featuring teams from top IT companies with trophies and networking opportunities
requirements: Company ID, sports attire, team registration

title: Startup Investors Summit
address: Taj Palace Hotel, Diplomatic Enclave, New Delhi
description: Connect with angel investors and venture capitalists. Pitch your startup and explore funding opportunities
speakers: Anil Aggarwal (VC Partner), Priya Mehta (Angel Investor), Rajiv Khanna (Startup Mentor)

title: Online Digital Marketing Masterclass
description: Live online masterclass on digital marketing strategies, SEO, and social media marketing with practical assignments
speakers: Digital Marketing Guru Sameer, SEO Expert Anjali
requirements: Laptop with internet, notebook for taking notes

title: Freshers Welcome Party
address: College Auditorium, Delhi University North Campus
description: Welcome party for first year students with music, dance, games and cultural performances

title: Virtual Career Fair 2024
description: Online career fair connecting job seekers with top companies through virtual booths and video interviews
speakers: HR Managers from Google, Microsoft, Amazon
requirements: Updated resume, webcam, stable internet connection

title: Contemporary Art Exhibition
address: National Gallery of Modern Art, Jaipur House, Delhi
description: Exhibition of contemporary Indian art featuring works from emerging and established artists
speakers: Curator Dr. Anjali Mehta, Artist Rahul Verma

title: Online Yoga & Meditation Session
description: Daily online yoga and meditation sessions for mental and physical wellness with certified instructors
speakers: Yoga Instructor Priya Sharma, Meditation Guide Rohan Kumar
requirements: Yoga mat, comfortable clothes, quiet space

title: Bollywood Night Live Concert
description: Live concert featuring top Bollywood playback singers with full orchestra and spectacular light show. Also streamed online
speakers: Singer Arijit Singh, Composer Vishal Dadlani

title: Virtual Book Club Meeting
description: Monthly virtual book club meeting discussing contemporary literature with authors and fellow readers
speakers: Author Meera Joshi, Literary Critic Dr. Anand
requirements: Read the selected book, webcam for discussion

title: Hybrid Tech Conference 2024
description: Annual technology conference covering latest trends in AI, blockchain, and cloud computing with both physical and virtual attendance options
speakers: Tech Leaders from Infosys, TCS, Wipro
requirements: Laptop for virtual attendees, business casual for offline
